snippet: The former chairman of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey will cease cooperating with the legislative investigation surrounding the George Washington Bridge.
abstract: Lawyers for former Port Authority of New York and New Jersey chairman David Samson say Samson will cease cooperating with New Jersey legislative committee investigating 2013 closing of access lanes to George Washington Bridge; attorneys accuse committee of leaking information Samson had already turned over under subpoena, and making biased statements to reporters.
lead_paragraph: The former chairman of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey will cease cooperating with the legislative investigation surrounding the George Washington Bridge.

headline.main: Ex-Official of Port Agency to Rebuff State Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Ex-Official of Port Agency to Rebuff State Inquiry

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
